title.rendered: Convergences launched its publication relative to Social Business and CAC40 companies!

content.rendered:
[et_pb_section admin_label=”Section” fullwidth=”on” specialty=”off”][et_pb_fullwidth_image admin_label=”Image en pleine largeur” src=”https://www.convergences.org/wp-content/uploads/2017/05/IMG_4786.jpg” show_in_lightbox=”off” url=”https://www.eventbrite.fr/e/sortie-de-lenquete-les-entreprises-du-cac-40-le-social-business-tickets-33087565800″ url_new_window=”off” use_overlay=”off” animation=”left” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”] [/et_pb_fullwidth_image][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section admin_label=”section”][et_pb_row admin_label=”row”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Texte” background_layout=”light” text_orientation=”left” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

After one study about Social Business and CAC40 companies published in April 2015, the team Convergences is happy to launch a 2nd edition, whose main theme is impact mesurement. This year, 15 companies presented their initatives and shared their practices in impact mesurement of social business: they allowed us to highlight, thanks to this study, the diversity of social businesses within the 40 biggest French companies.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider admin_label=”Séparateur” color=”#ffffff” show_divider=”off” divider_style=”solid” divider_position=”top” hide_on_mobile=”on”] [/et_pb_divider][et_pb_image admin_label=”Image” src=”https://www.convergences.org/wp-content/uploads/2017/05/IMG_4690.jpg” show_in_lightbox=”off” url_new_window=”off” use_overlay=”off” animation=”off” sticky=”off” align=”left” force_fullwidth=”off” always_center_on_mobile=”on” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”] [/et_pb_image][et_pb_text admin_label=”Texte” background_layout=”light” text_orientation=”left” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid” text_line_height=”1.6em” header_line_height=”1.7em”]

The evening launch of the publication was on Apil 24th at the First Tower, at EY’s.

Speakers:
Eric Mugnier, Sustainable Performance and Transformation Associate, EY
Axelle Hallu, L’Oréal Solidarity Sourcing Director, L’Oréal
Eric Lesueur, 2EI Veolia Director, Veolia
Gilles Salesse, Corporate Social Responsibility & Sustainable development Direction, Société Générale
Claudia Belli, Social entrepreneurship and microfinance Manager, BNP Paribas
François Rouvier, Director of the social entrepreneurship programme MOBILIZ, Renault
Sarah Tesei, Social innovation and human rights Director, VINCI
Jean-Luc Perron, Vice-president, Convergences
Emilie Poisson, Executive director, Convergences
Carolina Herrera, Deputy director, Convergences
Joséphine de Bartillat, Study and project Officer, Convergences

You missed the evening launch?  The French version of the publication can be downloaded online!
